en.title: FE Welcomes VIP QP Wearer, Ambassador Preciosa Soliven of the Philippines!
en.content:
Jeremy Looi, Ambassador Preciosa S. Soliven, FE Founder Director KS Lee and Judge Lorenzo. Ambassador Soliven founded the O.B. Montessori Center (Philippines) in 1975, the largest Montessori Center in the world with 5,000 students in four branches. As Secretary General of UNESCO (United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organization) National Commission of the Philippines, she helped preserve the Banaue Rice Terraces by having it declared a World Heritage Site.
Her numerous awards include the UNESCO Silver Medal as Executive Council Member and the Leadership Award in the Drug Free Campaign. FE is proud to have someone of such caliber with FE!
